facts.title: Mission
facts.body: To prepare young people, especially females for the future of work and society, using technology as a tool for impact

facts.title: Vision
facts.body: A future where opportunity is accessible for all and females are prepared, can stand up for, express themselves and compete favourably with their counterparts

facts.title: Volunteer
facts.body: We need you, as we can not do this alone. Join us today as we make the world a better place
